verses.verse: And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Behold, I have hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto your voice <S%H6963><s%> in all that ye said <S%H559><s%> unto me, and have made <S%H4427><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> over you.

And now, behold, the king <S%H4428><s%> walketh <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: and I am old <S%H2204><s%> and grayheaded <S%H7867><s%>; and, behold, my sons <S%H1121><s%> are with you: and I have walked <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you from my childhood <S%H5271><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Behold, here I am: witness <S%H6030><s%> against me before the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and before his anointed <S%H4899><s%>: whose ox <S%H7794><s%> have I taken <S%H3947><s%>? or whose ass <S%H2543><s%> have I taken <S%H3947><s%>? or whom have I defrauded <S%H6231><s%>? whom have I oppressed <S%H7533><s%>? or of whose hand <S%H3027><s%> have I received any bribe <S%H3724><s%> to blind <S%H5956><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> therewith? and I will restore <S%H7725><s%> it you. bribe: Heb. ransom to blind: or, that I should hide mine eyes at him

And they said <S%H559><s%>, Thou hast not defrauded <S%H6231><s%> us, nor oppressed <S%H7533><s%> us, neither hast thou taken <S%H3947><s%> ought <S%H3972><s%> of any man's <S%H376><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is witness <S%H5707><s%> against you, and his anointed <S%H4899><s%> is witness <S%H5707><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, that ye have not found <S%H4672><s%> ought <S%H3972><s%> in my hand <S%H3027><s%>. And they answered <S%H559><s%>, He is witness <S%H5707><s%>.

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, It is the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that advanced <S%H6213><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and that brought <S%H5927><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>. advanced: or, made

Now therefore stand still <S%H3320><s%>, that I may reason <S%H8199><s%> with you before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of all the righteous acts <S%H6666><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, which he did <S%H6213><s%> to you and to your fathers <S%H1><s%>. righteous: Heb. righteousnesses, or, benefits to: Heb. with

When Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was come <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and your fathers <S%H1><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, which brought forth <S%H3318><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and made them dwell <S%H3427><s%> in this place <S%H4725><s%>.

And when they forgat <S%H7911><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>, he sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, captain <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%>, and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and they fought <S%H3898><s%> against them.

And they cried <S%H2199><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, We have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, because we have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and have served <S%H5647><s%> Baalim <S%H1168><s%> and Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%>: but now deliver <S%H5337><s%> us out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of our enemies <S%H341><s%>, and we will serve <S%H5647><s%> thee.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%>, and Bedan <S%H917><s%>, and Jephthah <S%H3316><s%>, and Samuel <S%H8050><s%>, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of your enemies <S%H341><s%> on every side <S%H5439><s%>, and ye dwelled <S%H3427><s%> safe <S%H983><s%>.

And when ye saw <S%H7200><s%> that Nahash <S%H5176><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> came <S%H935><s%> against you, ye said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Nay; but a king <S%H4428><s%> shall reign <S%H4427><s%> over us: when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> was your king <S%H4428><s%>.

Now therefore behold the king <S%H4428><s%> whom ye have chosen <S%H977><s%>, and whom ye have desired <S%H7592><s%>! and, behold, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath set <S%H5414><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> over you.

If ye will fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> him, and obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and not rebel <S%H4784><s%> against the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, then shall both ye and also the king <S%H4428><s%> that reigneth <S%H4427><s%> over you continue following <S%H310><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: commandment: Heb. mouth continue: Heb. be after

But if ye will not obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, but rebel <S%H4784><s%> against the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, then shall the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be against you, as it was against your fathers <S%H1><s%>.
Now therefore <S%H1571><s%> stand <S%H3320><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%>, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

Is it not wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest <S%H7105><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%>? I will call <S%H7121><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and he shall send <S%H5414><s%> thunder <S%H6963><s%> and rain <S%H4306><s%>; that ye may perceive <S%H3045><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> that your wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is great <S%H7227><s%>, which ye have done <S%H6213><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, in asking <S%H7592><s%> you a king <S%H4428><s%>.

So Samuel <S%H8050><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H5414><s%> thunder <S%H6963><s%> and rain <S%H4306><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>: and all the people <S%H5971><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> and Samuel <S%H8050><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Samuel <S%H8050><s%>, Pray <S%H6419><s%> for thy servants <S%H5650><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, that we die <S%H4191><s%> not: for we have added <S%H3254><s%> unto all our sins <S%H2403><s%> this evil <S%H7451><s%>, to ask <S%H7592><s%> us a king <S%H4428><s%>.

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not: ye have done <S%H6213><s%> all this wickedness <S%H7451><s%>: yet turn not aside <S%H5493><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, but serve <S%H5647><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with all your heart <S%H3824><s%>;
And turn ye not aside <S%H5493><s%>: for then should ye go after <S%H310><s%> vain <S%H8414><s%> things, which cannot profit <S%H3276><s%> nor deliver <S%H5337><s%>; for they are vain <S%H8414><s%>.

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will not forsake <S%H5203><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> for his great <S%H1419><s%> name's <S%H8034><s%> sake: because it hath pleased <S%H2974><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> you his people <S%H5971><s%>.

Moreover as for me <S%H595><s%>, God forbid <S%H2486><s%> that I should sin <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in ceasing <S%H2308><s%> to pray <S%H6419><s%> for you: but I will teach <S%H3384><s%> you the good <S%H2896><s%> and the right <S%H3477><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>: in: Heb. from

Only fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> him in truth <S%H571><s%> with all your heart <S%H3824><s%>: for consider <S%H7200><s%> how great things he hath done <S%H1431><s%> for you. how: or, what a great thing
But if ye shall still <S%H7489><s%> do wickedly <S%H7489><s%>, ye shall be consumed <S%H5595><s%>, both ye and your king <S%H4428><s%>.
